long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: On GitHub's pull request page, this extension will change the  "Confirm Merge" button's text to "2... 3... ש-גר!". and when clicking the button, it will play a sound (saying the phrase).
